books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The 11th book in the conservative commentator’s Killing series gives an account of the global war against terrorists.
books.name: KILLING THE KILLERS

books.author: by Viola Davis
books.description: The multiple award-winning actress describes the difficulties she encountered before claiming her sense of self and achieving professional success.
books.name: FINDING ME

books.author: by Mark T. Esper
books.description: The former secretary of defense gives an account of serving in his post until he was fired by the president after the 2020 election.
books.name: A SACRED OATH

books.author: by Lily Ebert and Dov Forman
books.description: A 98-year-old woman who gained attention through TikTok videos tells her story of surviving Auschwitz.
books.name: LILY'S PROMISE

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Tina Brown
books.description: This follow-up to “The Diana Chronicles” details how the royal family reinvented itself after the death of Princess Diana.
books.name: THE PALACE PAPERS

books.author: by Jonathan Martin and Alexander Burns
books.description: Two New York Times correspondents chronicle the 2020 election and the first year of the Biden presidency.
books.name: THIS WILL NOT PASS

books.author: by Vaclav Smil
books.description: A look at our 21st-century lives covering food production, globalization and the environment, and prognostications on our quality of life ahead.
books.name: HOW THE WORLD REALLY WORKS

books.author: by Jennifer Grey
books.description: The actress details growing up the child of Joel Grey, her iconic film roles and the repercussions from a plastic surgery procedure.
books.name: OUT OF THE CORNER

books.author: by Ali Wentworth
books.description: The comedic actress shares stories of joy and despair during the Covid-19 pandemic.
books.name: ALI'S WELL THAT ENDS WELL

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Melissa Gilbert
books.description: The actress and former president of the Screen Actors Guild chronicles renovating a cottage in the Catskills during the Covid-19 pandemic.
books.name: BACK TO THE PRAIRIE

books.author: by David Gergen
books.description: The former White House adviser to four presidents details the stories of iconic and effective leaders.
books.name: HEARTS TOUCHED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Michelle Zauner
books.description: The daughter of a Korean mother and Jewish-American father, and leader of the indie rock project Japanese Breakfast, describes creating her own identity after losing her mother to cancer.
books.name: CRYING IN H MART

books.author: by Jon Krakauer
books.description: Two brothers who subscribed to a fundamentalist version of Mormonism killed a woman and her daughter; the basis of the TV series.
books.name: UNDER THE BANNER OF HEAVEN
